entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 16. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
